default_message: Error: token of value '${value}' found at line ${line} and column ${column}

error_messages.error_comment_block: Input reached end of file before closing block comment
error_messages.error_bash_block: Input reached end of file before closing bash block
error_messages.error_bash_sub: Input reached end of file before closing bash subshell
error_messages.error_invalid_character: Invalid character '${value}' found at line ${line} and column ${column}
